room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: Overall a good room, we did the Museum it was a very very small room.  I would not recommend more than 4 people.  We had a group of five and were literally tripping over each other.  I would say the main room is roughly 10 x 10  at most with a lot of old looking and worn furniture.  One bright spot was the The game master was excellent.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: Have gone twice - did a museum one and family did a casino one. The museum was definitely harder; both were fun. Well done; good experience with a group.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: We had so much fun with our group, and the game master was super helpful.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: Fantastic experience. I've done many escape rooms with my friends and we all agreed that this is one of the best we've done. Operation: Casino was a ton of fun and we will absolutely be back to do all of the others rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Operation: Casino" by Breakout Games - Rochester in Rochester (NY)
review: When I first walked into Operation: Casino, I knew it would be a great experience. The room was well designed, and there was enough room for my whole group. When we didn't understand a clue, our Game Master gave us helpful hints, and we did very well. Overall, the experience made many memories for my friends and I, so we'll most likely return.
